events.name: Volunteers' Summit
events.short: Whether youâ€™re a Fresher or a Charity Week Veteran, Volunteers' Summit is your first stop to find out everything about the campaign and how you can get involved!

events.name: Auction Dinner
events.short: The Auction Dinner perfectly captures the essence of CW! You can expect to enjoy all the much loved exciting auction bidding battles, competitions, prizes, speeches and CW farewells!

events.name: Speakers
events.short: From inspiring talks to engaging quizzes, the opportunities to educate and inform students across campus of CW, the History of Islam theme and other important topics are endless. We will be hosting multiple speaker events on important and interesting topics that will stay with you long after you have attended.

events.name: Collects
events.short: We think of Collects as the true spirit of Charity Week. From chanting the CW vision to rallying the spirits of volunteer collectors, this is an event you should definitely get involved with!

events.name: Challenges
events.short: At the heart of every mighty campaign is a challenge - one that tests its volunteers and helps forge unbreakable bonds of friendship. Check out the challenges we will try to conquer!
